snippet: Rick Santorum sampled a cheese curd during a visit on Monday to Simon's Specialty Cheese in Appleton, Wis. Mr. Santorum also signed cheeseheads, the signature headgear of Green Bay Packers fans, during his stop, but declined to don one, citing his...
abstract: Rick Santorum sampled a cheese curd during a visit on Monday to Simon's Specialty Cheese in Appleton, Wis. Mr. Santorum also signed cheeseheads, the signature headgear of Green Bay Packers fans, during his stop, but declined to don one, citing his allegiance to the Pittsburgh Steelers.

headline.main: Caucus Click: A Steelers Fan in Cheesehead Land
